column1: path_to_DB###Outputs/Tissue_BW_output_DB/Database-Tissues.csv###path to the database created by tissue_bw_prop.py
tissue_ids###0###list of tissues that will be outputed in the MaMuT file
tissue_names###F6negative###mapping of the names of the tissues to the list of tissue ids from above
filename###blank_bdv.xml###name of the big data viewer xml config file
folder###/media/martin/12TiB RAID0/Fused Live Datasets/Blank Dataset/###path to the folder containing the big data viewer xml config file
begin###0###first time point to take into account
end###180###last time point to take into account
v_size###0.380490285###voxel size in physical units (here in microns for example)
dT###6###time resolution in physical units (here in minutes for example)

column2: requires barycenters established in tissue-bw-prop step
